description: Detecting suspicious error log events which lead to potential security threats
name: Anomaly Nginx_Critical
query: event.dataset : "nginx.error" and message : "http alloc large header buffer" or message : "http large header free:" or message : "http large header alloc:" or message : "http large header copy:" or message : "client sent too long URI" or message : "SSL renegotiation" or message : "client sent invalid chunked body" or message : "buffer overflow"
